marketing.no_boring_lessons_txt: Budbee facilitates students to connect and interact with each other by sharing their ideas, knowledge and also help each other.
marketing.add_color_learning_txt: Budbee facilitates peer learning, gives access to global multimedia content and a platform to share your ideas and knowledge.All the content is aligned with the National Educational Program.
marketing.gamified_learning_txt_2: Budbee identifies the competency level of every student and helps them strengthen their knowledge base through a gamified learning approach.We see more value in rewarding every student for their own accomplishments rather than just competing with others.
marketing.peer_interaction_txt: With Budbee, it is easy to communicate, share your ideas, knowledge, and also help each other in the learning process. All this happens in a safe environment.
marketing.track_progress_txt_1: Budbee tracks the progress of students in an adaptive learning format.Budbee identifies the competency level of every student and helps them through gamified learning approach.
marketing.teachers_slide_txt_1: This message is proprietary to Dew Solutions Pvt.Ltd., and is intended solely for the use of the individual to whom it is addressed. It may contain privileged or confidential information.
marketing.teachers_slideHeading_2: Post your ideas & and view ideas shared by your buddies

marketing.testomonialTeacher: KPLMS gives me the flexibility to make lesson plans and notes that i can access from anywhere, anytime.
